translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions in Brief

analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa āsa vaduka sa ni dassa nattika
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions in Detail🔽With-contaminant, visible-form-object, etc.

original: Nasāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Naanāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa āsavam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  na anāsavam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object condition: With-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object dhammas arise with a with-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object dhamma as condition by way of root-cause condition. … one …🔽With-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object condition: With-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object dhammas arise with a without-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object dhamma as condition by way of root-cause condition. … one … (Abbreviated.) … by way of support condition … by way of presence condition … by way of non-disappearance condition … three …

original: (Nasāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighamūlassa purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa āsavam na a nidassana sa paṭigha mūlassa purima nayena tīṇi pañhāḥ hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object condition: With-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object dhammas arise with a without-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object dhamma as condition by way of root-cause condition. … three … (Abbreviated.) … by way of support condition … by way of presence condition … by way of non-disappearance condition … three …

original: Naanāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na anāsavam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object condition: With-contaminant, non-visible-form-object, impinging-object dhammas arise with a without-contaminant, visible-form-object, impinging-object dhamma as condition by way of root-cause condition. … one … (Abbreviated.) … by way of support condition … by way of presence condition … by way of non-disappearance condition … one …🔽With-contaminant, non-visible-form-object, impinging-object condition: With-contaminant, non-visible-form-object, impinging-object dhammas arise with a without-contaminant, non-visible-form-object, impinging-object dhamma as condition by way of root-cause condition. … one … (Abbreviated.) … by way of support condition … by way
